span.p: We have an equal number of positive (orange) and negative (blue) charges distributed between two cylindrical barriers which they cannot cross. We can control the amount of charge on a central charge which is interior to the innermost of the two cylinders. In the image shown, the central charge is neutral (silver) but with the slider we can make it positive (orange) or negative (blue).

Click and drag using the left mouse button to rotate. Click and drag using the right mouse button (or use SHIFT + left mouse button) to change the center of view. And click and drag using the mouse wheel (or use CTRL + left mouse button) to zoom in/out.
(Please be patient - the simulation may take ~20 seconds to load)
